description: This file is a React component for the main page of a responsive Tic Tac Toe game, defining the UI layout, state management, and interactions using hooks and components.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Defines metadata for the page, including title and description.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the game UI, managing state via useTicTacToe hook, and handling accessibility features.
